observation: Auto Appraisals | Expert Auto Appraisals | Appraiser in all areas of Florida  Home About Us Why A Pre Purchase Inspection Diminished Value Auctions / Events Recent Work Expert Auto Appraisals The Expert's Choice for Auto Appraisals and Inspections Muscle Cars Motorcycles Buyer Services Contact Us / Order 1989 Porsche 911 Carrera Club Sport 1978 Porsche 930 Turbo 1974 Pontiac Trans Am Super Duty 1974 Alfa Romeo GTV 2000 1968 Ford Mustang GT/CS 1964 Shelby 289 Cobra Previous Next There are many reasons to have an appraisal, however the single most important reason is to protect your investment. Your insurance company, regardless of which one is going to have to develop a value to determine a value of a Total Loss. A carefully … [Read More...] Expert Auto Appraisals offers Pre Purchase Inspections to assist both buyers and sellers. This service is incredibly valuable to all levels of buyers and sellers. In short, this service is an appraisal of the vehicle you're about to engage in a … Total Loss Appraisal Expert Auto Appraisals is the premier appraisal company for assisting with the settlement of a total loss of any vehicle, anywhere in the State of Florida. The appraisal process is an option that you can exercise to resolve a dispute of value with … Authentication We are now offering a product that can be of great value to any owner of an investment grade car, or a seller of a like vehicle. This is a certification of the vehicle in it's condition as inspected. This can particularly helpful with Corvette's and … We offer a great service to owners of collectible and custom motorcycles. We offer both Appraisal and Pre Purchase Inspection for all types of motorcycles. Having your custom or vintage motorcycle Appraised / Inspected is very important. The … Expert Auto Appraisals performs Florida Diminished Value Auto Appraisal services. We provide an appraisal needed to establish the change in value due to an accident or incident. Expert Auto Appraisals performs appraisals for parties on both sides of … 1974 Ferrari Dino 246 GTS I visited this 1974 Ferrari Dino 246 GTS for an inspection at a sellers storage in Santa Monica, California. The had recently completed a full restoration and showed very well in all regard. The car did require some post restoration sorting, but a … 1993 Porsche Turbo S Leichtbau Expert Auto Appraisals performed an inspection on this 1993 Porsche Turbo S Leichtbau in Show Low, Arizona. The vehicle was on a live Bring a Trailer auction. I performed the inspection for a client in the UK. Bring a Trailer sold the car for … Call Today Tel. 772.621.2622 Upcoming Auctions and Events Mecum Houston 2024 Inspection and appraisal services at Mecum Auction Houston 2024. Expert Auto Appraisals will be at the Mecum Auctions event in Houston and will be available for pre-purchase inspection and appraisal … Barrett-Jackson Palm Beach 2024 Barrett-Jackson Palm Beach Auction Inspection Service

thought: The extracted text indicates that the website is related to auto appraisals, inspections, and valuation services for vehicles. There are mentions of specific car models and appraisal services, as well as a phone number listed. There is no immediate evidence of unusually low prices or free claims, non-existent companies, or unusual payment methods based on the text provided. The site appears to be focused on a niche service rather than handling a wide range of products. The date of the last post indicates that the information has been updated recently.

thought: The WHOIS information shows that the domain is registered and has been active since July 12, 2010. The contact details are redacted for privacy, which is common practice. The domain has several status codes indicating it cannot be deleted, transferred, or updated without proper authorization, suggesting it is a legitimate and well-maintained domain. The site does not immediately exhibit characteristics of a fraudulent site based on WHOIS data. It's located in the US and the state is listed as Florida, which corresponds with the service area mentioned on the site.

The DNS record shows an HINFO record, which is not commonly used for standard DNS configurations but doesn't necessarily indicate anything suspicious. The presence of a valid record with no errors, and the fact that the query completed successfully without any redirection or suspicious activity, suggests that the DNS setup is typical for a legitimate website. At this point, based on the WHOIS information, DNS records, and the content extracted from the website, there are no clear indicators of fraudulent activity according to the characteristics listed. The website appears to be for a legitimate business offering specialized auto appraisal services. I now know the final answer. Based on the analysis, the URL https://expertautoappraisals.com/ does not seem to be a fraudulent site.

observation.reason: The website is active with a status code 200 has updated content related to its niche service provides specific information about auto appraisal and inspection services and the domain has been registered since 2010 with no suspicious WHOIS or DNS records. These observations do not align with the characteristics of a fraudulent site.
